quotes: Member since 2008
Dr Machel served as Education Minister in Mozambique until 1989
she founded the Foundation for Community Development in 1994
In 1997, Dr Machel chaired a UN Report on the Impact of Armed Conflict on Children

organizations.name: Graça Machel Trust
quotes: Dr Graça Machel is the Founder of the Graça Machel Trust, an organisation focused on child health and nutrition, education, women’s economic and financial empowerment, leadership and good governance.

organizations.name: Foundation for Community Development
quotes: Following this, she founded the Foundation for Community Development in 1994, an NGO that promotes partnering for development, democracy and social justice.

organizations.name: UN
quotes: In 1997, Dr Machel chaired a UN Report on the Impact of Armed Conflict on Children

organizations.name: The Elders
quotes: Dr Machel currently sits on the board of The Elders.

organizations.name: African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes
quotes: and Board Chair of the African Centre for the Constructive Resolution of Disputes.

organizations.name: The Hunger Project
quotes: Dr Machel is a recipient of the Africa Prize for Leadership for the Sustainable End of Hunger from the Hunger Project.

organizations.name: WHO
quotes: and the WHO Gold Medal, for contributions to the health and wellbeing of women, children and adolescents.
